channel.title: Need easy help
channel.description:
I just was curious on how to do these things:
1.Make People Admin/mod/staff with a code like ::givemod 2.easy way to make only one spot wild like pkbox 3.how to fully make a npc sell stuff 4.how to make ppl turn into wise old man when they wear a blue phat
Lol i realy need help ive tried asking everyone!

item.title: Need easy help
item.dc:creator: @mojo4sho mojo4sho
item.description:
@mojo4sho wrote:

dude im like hella good at this stuff i just figured if ppl showed me how to do it i could change it and figure ut sum new stuff

Read full topic

item.title: Need easy help
item.dc:creator: @flargie flargie
item.description:
@flargie wrote:

great idea on telling them to learn themselves, this will help him a bunch, and things he will see in client.java probably will let him learn more about java language, maybe he can identify the code such ass (additem ###) etc and start to read and look at it

i hope you figure this out, and great luck on keeping your server going!!

~flargie~

Read full topic

item.title: Need easy help
item.dc:creator: @O_M_G1 O M G
item.description:
@O_M_G1 wrote:

Theres a way to do all of that, so you’ll eventually figure it out. I’m sure people will help you along the way once you get to know the right people

For 4. the basicness would be:

if itemSlot[head]=party hat id{
pnpc code to wise old man
}else{
normal;
}

In COMPLETE basicness. I could figure out the entire correct code but Mopars new idea/theme is to make people learn by them selves. Search your client for the stuff above to make it work

Read full topic
